attributes.action: remove, with immediate effect, the titles of "Honourable" for MPs and "Right Honourable" for ministers because they have shown no honour when over claiming expenses .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a good number of MPs have not been honourable in claiming expenses and are having to pay back some money, they do not deserve to be termed "honourable"

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
